title: computer stuck(freeze)  after tab + alt
body:
after i updated my computer to window 10 creator{{champion:79}} , i couldnt switch between applications by pressing tab + alt.
every time, when i press tab + alt during lol gaming, the computer screen will be stuck(computer is like freeze).
i still could hear the sound, but no matter what  i press (i tried alt +F4 and alt + Ctrl+ delete)
the screen is just totally freeze. 
does it happen to anyone else?

i followed all the steps on https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974 
nothing changed, the screen still stuck after i press alt + tab. 

need help ~{{summoner:1}}

replies.body: Same thing to me too! Cant find a proper solution

This sounds like a possible issue with drivers or something else failing to process tabbing out.  You can still hear sounds but a driver failure could end up in a frozen or black screen.  Switching to borderless could certainly help, but I also suggest using the steps in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to make sure your pc and settings are tuned up.  It's especially important to make sure your drivers are up to date after switching to another OS.  Let me know of that helps.

I had the same thing

Switching from fullscreen mode to borderless window mode fixed my problems
